title: Polly Mosendz Discusses Lawsuit Against Fyre Festival (Audio)
itunes:title: Polly Mosendz Discusses Lawsuit Against Fyre Festival (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Polly Mosendz, a Bloomberg News Staff Writer, discusses her story about a lawsuit against the Fyre Festival. She speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
